com.pega.pegarules.pub

Interface CancelToken

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PollForUpdate.CancelableTask<R>

    public interface CancelToken
    Cancel token to allow task cancelling.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel(long waitTimeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Try to cancel running task.
      void cancelFinished()
      Mark cancel operation as finished.

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        void cancel(long waitTimeout,
            java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Try to cancel running task. Invoking thread may be paused for waitTimeout period (implementation specific).
        Parameters:
        waitTimeout - wait timeout value.
        timeUnit - wait timeout unit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - when wait was interrupted.
        See Also:
        PollForUpdate

      • cancelFinished

        void cancelFinished()
        Mark cancel operation as finished. Allows for communication between a thread that started cancel operation and a thread affected by it.
